property.value: A great publisher, but their movies are so bad.

property.name: text

property.name: text
property.value: They have the best movies. Keep it on!.

property.name: description
property.value: Publisher founded in 1934 by Malcolm Wheeler-Nicholson.

property.name: description
property.value: Publisher founded in 1939 as Timely Publications by Martin Goodman. Refounded in 1960 as Marvel Comics by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby.

property.name: description
property.value: Publisher founded in 1992 by famous authors who left Marvel Comics like Todd McFarlane, Jim Lee and Rob Liefeld.

property.name: description
property.value: One of the best comic book authors of his generation. Known for his absolut knowledge of the superheroe world.

property.name: description
property.value: One of the best comic book authors of his generation. He is known for his anti-american stories.

property.name: description
property.value: Considered as the greatest comic book writer in history, he is known for being the author of some of the best masterpieces of this art like Watchmen, V for Vendetta, From Hell,etc.

property.name: description
property.value: One of the best comic book authors of history, he is one of the authors who reinvented the superheroe genre on the 80's. Known for being the author of masterpieces like Dark knight returns, Daredevil:Born again, Sin City, etc.

property.name: description
property.value: Robert kirkman is an american comic book author who is most known for being the author of the famous comic book serie named The walkind dead.

property.name: description
property.value: Due to Flash's actions, the world turned into an alternate reality set in a civil war.

property.name: description
property.value: Due to government issues, the superheroes of the world split in two groups, one led by Captain America and the other one led by Ironman. Both groups fight in a war to achieve their own goals.

property.name: description
property.value: 1984. Superheroes have been banned and now they only can work for the government. One of them is murdered and Rorschach, a old hero who works against the government rules, starts investigating it.

property.name: description
property.value: Daredevil's secret identity is blown by his worst enemy, Kingpin. Due to this, his life becomes an absolut hell.

property.name: description
property.value: This comic shows a distopic reality where the zombies have taken over the world and a group of peope has to survive in it.

property.name: description
property.value: One of the most famous comic characters in all comic books. Created by Bob Kane and Bill Finger for DC Comics. He is one of the three members of DC Trinity.Due to his parents' murdered, he fights crime using amazing items built by him.

property.name: description
property.value: Tony stark is a billionaire playboy who lives the life the way he wants. But he also is an engineering genius capable of build amazing war armors. He fights the crime using this armors.

property.name: description
property.value: Captain America is an american symbol who represents the american way. He is a very patriotic hero who fights crime for his country.

property.name: description
property.value: An old violent hero who works against the rules set by the government.

property.name: description
property.value: Matt Murdock is a blind person who jobs as a lawyer by day but, when the night comes, he becomes a crime fighter known as Daredevil.

property.name: description
property.value: Peter Parker is a student who was bitten by a radioactive spider.He got powers related to spiders due to this bite. Now, as Spiderman, he uses these powers to fight crime.

property.name: description
property.value: Flash has travelled to the past to save his mother, but his actions have turned the reality into a new one.

property.name: description
property.value: Wonder Woman and Aquaman are enemies in this reality. This war is destroying the whole world and Flash, helped by Thomas Wayne, has to fix the reality before it's too late.

property.name: description
property.value: The reality is about to collapse. Zoom, Flash's main enemy, is here to kill Flash once and for all. The final battle is set to happen.

property.name: description
property.value: Two groups of superheroes are formed due to government issues. Captain America and Ironman are the leaders of each one.

property.name: description
property.value: Captain America's group is against the government, so they need to hide. Ironman's group is looking after them to catch them.

property.name: description
property.value: The two groups collide in a epic battle in the middle of New York.
